title: M&M cruises through SUV opportunity to emerge as category revenue leader
description: The rise in SUV popularity has propelled Mahindra & Mahindra to the forefront of the Indian automotive sector. Despite previous struggles with only the Scorpio as its flagship, the company has turned the tide and emerged as the leading revenue earner in the SUV segment, outperforming competitors like Toyota, Hyundai, Tata Motors, Kia, and Maruti Suzuki.
